segments.text: Oh, this brings back so many memories of my own childhood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so clever, sneaking cookies while the woman is distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I remember doing the same thing with my siblings when we were little.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes and not noticing a thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and the kids are being mischievous, but she's in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost taste the cookies, they look so good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so determined to get those cookies, standing on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting patiently for her share, it's so cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could go back to those simple, carefree days.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is so full of life and nostalgia, it's making me smile.
segments.speaker: PAR
